error.message: Call to deprecated function db_insert(). Deprecated in drupal:8.0.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Instead, get a database connection injected into your service from the container and call insert() on it. For example,
Call to deprecated method l() of class Drupal\Core\Controller\ControllerBase. Deprecated in drupal:8.0.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\Link::fromTextAndUrl() instead.

Call to deprecated method url() of class Drupal\Core\Controller\ControllerBase. Deprecated in drupal:8.0.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\Url::fromUri() instead.

Call to deprecated function node_type_get_types(). Deprecated in drupal:8.0.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\node\Entity\NodeType::loadMultiple().

Call to deprecated function drupal_get_messages(). Deprecated in drupal:8.5.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\Messenger\MessengerInterface::all() or \Drupal\Core\Messenger\MessengerInterface::messagesByType() instead.
Call to deprecated method url() of class Drupal\Core\Form\FormBase. Deprecated in drupal:8.0.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\Url::fromUri() instead.

Add core_version_requirement: ^8 || ^9 to node_paypal_payment.info.yml to designate that the module is compatible with Drupal 9. See https://www.drupal.org/node/3070687.
